question:
You are organizing a conference for your company. Write a letter to a colleague asking him/her to give a presentation during the conference.-Describe what this conference is about-Why you want him/her to give a presentation
-Give details about the conference
text: I am writing this letter to inform you about an upcoming conference on the company's growth strategies. Hence, we are looking for an employee who can present a case study with a few real-time examples despite our daily activities.

As you heard, this would be an opportunity to demonstrate our phenomenal talent in front of all corporate team members. Having said that, you would be the right person to fulfil this post and take  responsibility  all the way. In addition, your's presentation skills along with time management strategies are really awesome which cannot find in the market.

Since this is all about growth and sales-related presentation, we need to collect and focus more on recent changes. However, we are organising this event in the heart of the city at 8pm followed by dinner. Furthermore, we also have special parking for our delegates to avoid  traffic delays. To execute this event in a smooth way we are placing  mesmerizing designs along with comfortable furniture.
I look forward to seeing your support to make this event a grand success.
